text: @piersmorgan you stopped being a journalist after publishing fake pictures of British troops tortured in Iraq on behalf of Tony Blair. Most recently you reported on Prince Charles having a Covid19 test as wrong while front-liners were finding that hard (you had a test last week - Hypocrite).
